column1: a.  all forest, waste, chena, uncultivated, or unoccupied land, unless proof is adduced
to the satisfaction of the court that some person-

column2: has acquired, by some lawful means, a valid title thereto, or
has acquired a right thereto as against the State by the issue to him of any
certificate of no claim by the State under the State Lands Encroachments
Ordinance or the Definition of Boundaries Ordinance, or
is entitled to possess the same under a written grant or lease made by or on
behalf of the British, Dutch, or Sri Lanka Governments, and duly registered
